game.title: The Quest of the Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of the pirates.
game.description: The pirates were robbing the city and now they've lost the treasure. Find it and return it to the city!

task.objective: Find the pirates and their ship.
task.description: The pirates are hiding in the forest. Find their ship and the treasure!
The pirates' ship is at the beach, but they've taken the treasure to a secret location. Find it!
